name: Equilibria Psychological and Consultation Services
tag_list: psychology, psychologists, therapy, group-therapy, marriage-counseling, family-therapy
overview:
Equilibria Psychology and Consultation Services psychologists and therapists’ mission is to compassionately and respectfully assist individuals in achieving personal potential and long-term growth by reaching a life of balance.

Equilibria Psychological and Consultation Services utilizes an integrated, strength based treatment model catered for individual’s unique therapy needs.

Our psychologists, social workers, and mental health professionals are skilled in therapy and assessment services for a broad range of emotional, behavioral, and life challenges. By blending cognitive-behavioral, interpersonal, systems-focused, and insight-oriented approaches, our psychologists are able to design effective treatment, consultation and assessment strategies suited for specifically for you.

All our psychology services are formed under the belief that treatment must be flexible and tailored in order to achieve symptom relief and increased self understanding.
